DOC.brief_summary: The proportion patient achieve LDL-C target define Swiss cholesterol recommendation ( AGLA-recommendations ) across start dos 10 mg , 20 mg , 40 mg , 80 mg atorvastatin .
DOC.brief_title: A Swiss Study With Atorvastatin Hyperlipidemic Patients Measuring LDL-Cholesterol
DOC.criteria: Risk factor diagnosis dyslipidemia accord AGLArecommendations ( see appendix B ) screen LDLC < 6.0 mmol/l Triglyceride level < 5.0 mmol/l . Subjects receive high `` usual maintenance '' dos Lipid Lowering Therapy ( LLT ) screening .
